alert.note: Alert for Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Todd County through 445 PM CDT... At 432 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elkton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Todd County, including the following locations... Justice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
